nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels: Meet the Rebels

Star Wars Rebels: Meet the Rebels is a Dorling Kindersley young-readers book in the Star Wars Rebels series. It was written by Sadie Smith and first published in the United States on July 21, 2014. A hardcover edition with expanded content was published in the United Kingdom on August 1, 2014.

Meet the rebels aboard the starship Ghost in DK's newest Level 2 Reader, Star Wars Rebels: Meet the Rebels! Set between Episode III and Episode IV, Rebels follows former Jedi Kanan Jarrus and his ragtag crew as they struggle against the Galactic Empire. Learn all about your favorite characters and go on the ultimate Star Wars adventure with Star Wars Rebels: Meet the Rebels!'
Read all about Ezra and his rebel friends as they battle against the evil rule of the Empire.
